name: 60 Second Thirsty Run
description:
This is 60 Second Thirsty Run! Our game for the 'GDL  April Jam' Game jam. 

You control a lone survivor, dying of dehydration. He must get a drink within 60 seconds or he will die! Can you help him? Play to find out!

Key Features
  • Fast-paced, action gameplay!
  • Over 10+ levels to play!
  • There are tons of bad guys just ready to be killed!
  • Fight a big, challenging, gruesome boss!
